attributes.action: Ensure there is no extension of public funding of political parties.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
PLANS to quadruple state funding for political parties to £28m a year have been devised by the civil servant in charge of cleaning up the system in the wake of the “cash for honours” affair.
Why should political parties be subsidised at all? They are a collection of people who band together to pursue mutual interests. Let them be funded by party members
